talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Nostalgia_01><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>time bell<clr:ffff> that sounds from the Temple
of Time rings at a set time each morning
and evening.<sp:0:4:0>Along with the constructs, <sp:5:0:0>we woke to the
sound of the bell. <sp:5:0:0>When we heard it in the
evening, we knew it was time to rest.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>It also played its part in our traditional
ceremonies. <sp:5:0:0>In a way, it was this place's
beating heart.<sp:0:4:0>The sight of the temple and the sound of
its bell stir fond memories in me.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>I see that they're still at work even now.<sp:0:4:0>We originally created the constructs to
assist in our endeavors. <sp:5:0:0>All of us were
fond of them.<sp:0:4:0>I never imagined they would continue to
carry out their assigned tasks to this day.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Nostalgia_06>The fact that their labor no longer serves
any purpose, yet they perform it still...<sp:5:1:0>it
is disquieting to me.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I am troubled by the sight of the
constructs we created.<sp:0:4:0>They still strive to fulfill their purpose,<sp:5:0:0>
even when anyone who would benefit
is gone.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Nostalgia_06>To see them toil away still...<sp:5:1:0>it grieves me.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The <clr:0000>Steward Constructs <clr:ffff>were the first to
be built. <sp:5:0:0>After that, we crafted others
suited to different roles.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0000>Culinary Constructs, Maker Constructs...<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>
You'll find all sorts of them still active in
this place.<sp:0:4:0>Some became so skilled within their
specialties that they surpassed us.<sp:5:0:0>
We began to learn from them instead.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>You should take time out to talk to them.<sp:5:0:0>
They can teach you many things you
might not yet know.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Nostalgia_06><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>Soldier Constructs <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Captain
Constructs<clr:ffff> are only doing their duty
to protect the Garden of Time.<sp:0:4:0>At the time, <sp:5:0:0>it was sadly necessary to
protect our land from invaders.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I am terribly sorry for any threat they
pose to you now.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Nostalgia_02>I love this view of the <clr:0000>Temple of Time<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I always took a moment to appreciate it
whenever I passed by here.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Temple of Time's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>time bell<clr:ffff> rang
each morning and evening. <sp:5:1:0>Its chime
was a constant in our lives.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>The best time in the garden was at dusk,<sp:5:0:0>
when the fireflies would emerge.
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Nostalgia_05><clr:ffff>You should be cautious around the <clr:0000>Soldier
Constructs <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Captain Constructs<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>While they are only protecting this land
from danger, <sp:5:0:0>they consider you a threat
as well.
talk_07:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> were the pinnacle of
our technology.<sp:0:4:0>We built an advanced civilization
with them and flourished for many,
many years.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00><clr:ffff>If you can master the use of the <clr:0000>Zonai
devices<clr:ffff>, your quest will be much easier.
talk_13:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_00>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are pieces of the
technology that was the foundation
of our civilization.<sp:0:4:0>If you can master using them, your quest
will be much easier for it.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>We find ourselves in a sea of clouds.<sp:0:4:0>Interesting. <sp:5:0:0>That would mean we're at
quite an altitude.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>As you heard from the Steward Construct,<sp:5:0:0>
this land is the <clr:0000>Garden of Time<clr:ffff>, site of the
kingdom's rites and ceremonies.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Nostalgia_06>Though in my day, it was on the surface.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Think>A sea of clouds...<sp:5:0:0> We must be at quite
an altitude.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>There is no doubt that this is the <clr:0000>Temple
of Time<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Which means we must be in
the <clr:0000>Garden of Time<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Nostalgia_06>But I remember it being on the surface.<sp:5:0:0>
What has happened in the ages since?
talk_09:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>time bell<clr:ffff> played its part in our
traditional ceremonies.<sp:0:4:0>In a way, it was this place's beating heart.
The sight of the temple and the sound of
its bell stir fond memories in me.
talk_15:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Nostalgia_01><clr:ffff>There are many types of constructs to be
found in this land. <clr:0000>Culinary Constructs,
Maker Constructs<clr:ffff>, and so forth.<sp:0:4:0>Some of them are better versed in their
subjects than I. <sp:5:0:0>You might learn a few
things by making time to speak with them.
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Nostalgia_01>I love this view of the <clr:0000>Temple of Time<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I always took a moment to appreciate it
whenever I passed by here.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Garden of Time<clr:ffff> was quiet. The only
sound to be heard was the <clr:0000>time bell<sp:5:0:0><clr:ffff>
ringing in mornings and evenings.<sp:0:4:0>It was as if the whole place changed at
its chime. <sp:5:0:0>Especially at night, when the
sound signaled the emergence of fireflies.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease_00>Those were glorious times.
